(OOC: Alright. fine, Soulstice, just don't go crazy. :-/ *Starts thinking* =
Why don't you decide?.)
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 8:28 PM
  Subject: Re=
: Neo Beast Wars


  (Damn, Orchid! Is the Beach the only place you know? I=
 thought they would go find a nice secluded place and work out their differ=
ences! Man!)
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
 =
   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 8:21 PM
    Subj=
ect: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Infectra nods to Stranato*

    Infectra: I =
agree with that.




    *Blizzard starts walking for the beach while holdi=
ng Sinister's hand*




    *Twister sits at a table inside the base and si=
ts her hands on the table and bangs her head on it and sits there*
      --=
--- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
      Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 8:02 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast =
Wars


      "We must do something, the Maximals we have never betrayed, we=
 must go to them." Stranato said.

      Sinister nodded to Blizard, he hel=
d her hand and started to walk to wherever Blizzard wanted to go...
       =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 5:08 PM
        Subj=
ect: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        Blizzard: Hmm...If you think you don't ne=
ed healing than we shall be off.

        *Blizzard says to Sinister*

    =
    *Twister walks into the base*



        Infectra: I don't think we can=
 change the way they act...If we do that they'll just go as before....That =
doesn't mean we totally shouldn't try it.....*sigh*

        *Infectra says=
 while frowning*
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: TH=
ECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, July 28, 2=
000 5:24 AM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          Sinesis goes =
to the CR Chamber to get healed.

          "Why when we can go now?" Sinis=
ter asked Blizzard.

          "I guess so, now that our friends are gone I=
 don't know where we should go." Stranato said to Infectra.

          "We =
never betrayed the Maximals, you think they's want us back?" Airbomber aske=
d.

          "They ignored our talent before, what makes you think it'll b=
e any different this time?" Stranato asked.

          "You can fake amnesi=
a." Airbomber suggested.

          "It's stupid, but it might work." Stran=
ato said...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: ilo=
vealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Friday,=
 July 28, 2000 4:58 AM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          =
  *Infectra looks around and sighs while looking at the ground and the sky =
and the bushs*

            Infectra: I wonder how'll we'll start...and wha=
t we'll eat......

            *Infectra sighs and frowns*



            B=
lizzard: Yeah!

            *Blizzard says quickly and evilly*

           =
 Blizzard: That's perfect. But first you should get into prime condition. A=
 small trip to the CR Chamber wouldn't hurt, would it?

            *Blizza=
rd says in a nice jolly tone to Sinister*


            Twister: I'll see i=
f I see you...

            *Twister says to Sinesis as she gets closer to =
the Base*

            *Twister looks back at Sinesis and just stares. Than=
 she looks at Blizzard and Sinister and frowns baring her teeth and turning=
 away*
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: THEC=
ODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Friday, July=
 28, 2000 2:05 AM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


             =
 Stranto sighed. He hoped they weren't running along, skipping merrily to t=
heir dooms.

              "I hope not, dear." Airbomber said to Infectra.
=

              Sinister smiled wickidly to Blizzard.

              "Like a=
 quiet spot nobody knows about?" He asked. Sinesis groaned. He worried abou=
t his brother's virginity for a while...
                ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
                From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 12:18 AM
      =
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                *Blizzard breaks th=
e kiss* (OOC:If it wasn't already broken)

                Blizzard: Want t=
o go somewhere after you get healed up?

                *Blizzard asks Sin=
ister*


                *Twister looks at Blizzard and Sinister and frowns=
 with a big sigh. She than stands up walks closer to the Base with her head=
 lowered*


                *Infectra sighs*

                Infectra: I h=
ope that the wind isn't a tornado.

                *Infectra closes her op=
tics*

                Infectra: Now where are heading? Which way?

       =
         *Infectra asks Airbomber while pointing her extended finger around=
*
